name: html-api
description: Makes creating an HTML API a breeze

scripts.build-polyfilled: node build/merge --sep-newline src/polyfills/map.js src/polyfills/array.js src/html-api.js > src/tmp-polyfilled.js
scripts.build-cleanup: del-cli src/tmp-transpiled.js; del-cli src/tmp-transpiled-full.js; del-cli src/tmp-polyfilled.js
scripts.build: npm run build-prepare && npm run build-polyfilled && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es5-full && npm run build-browser-es5 && npm run build-browser-es2015 && npm run build-browser-module && npm run build-node-es5 && npm run build-node-es2015 && npm run build-cleanup

author: Florian Reuschel <florian@loilo.de>
